Title: Relates to staffing at state-operated facilities that deliver health care services
Summary: Requires each state-operated facility that delivers health care services which is operated and licensed pursuant to the mental hygiene law, the education law, the correction law or section 504 of the executive law and which requires two or more registered nurses or licensed practical nurses to be present within the facility at any given time.
LawCode: Amd ยง2805-t, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to nurse staffing committees
